Description (The Action): The Threat. Using physical presence, volume, or violence to force compliance. "Get out of my way or I'll go through you."
The Jab. Fast talk, witty comebacks, and stinging insults. Using words like a rapier. "Nice outfit. Did you lose a bet?"
The Pressure. Relentless, unblinking pressure. Not shouting, just refusing to back down until they crack. "I can wait all day."
The Argument. Using facts, laws, and logical fallacies to dismantle their point. "Actually, regulation 4.B clearly states..."
The Read. Cold reading. Calling out their ticks, secrets, or lies to rattle them. "You're sweating. What are you afraid of?"
The Performance. Seduction, inspiration, or active deception. Making them want to agree with you. "Trust me, it's for the best."
